website_summaries.verdict: Fun brightly colored animals make an adorable addition to any nursery.
pros: Colorful decals brighten up any wall
Easy to apply and reposition if needed
Animals make an adorable addition to a nursery
No issues with corners curling or coming unstuck
You can get creative and design your own jungle scene
Sits at a low price point
cons: Few reports of decals causing paint damage
Some trouble sticking to textured walls

customer_reviews.title: The description is spot on
customer_reviews.text: It's simple, the description of the product is spot on. I knew what I was ordering and I got what I wanted. They are easy to stick on, peel off, repeat. They don't have an issue going back on the wall after many times taking them off and I know this because my 3yo won't leave them alone. They are cute and look exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskanLost

customer_reviews.title: Kinda pricy but we like these.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. I moved these around quite a few times till I had it how I liked it. They re-stuck just fine. No bubbles and no rips. Only con is they aren’t super vibrant but we’re happy with them. Good decoration without more holes in your drywall!
customer_reviews.author: JenniferTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING!! Perfect for our little nursery
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING!! Perfect for our little nursery! I was very impressed by how big they were and how much space they covered. I used them over baby's crib and had plenty more for over his changing station and bathroom door! They were a little tough to get off of the paper but they stick well to wall and door. And they look adorable!
customer_reviews.author: J. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Great design, adhesive does not allow easy removal
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 star rating because the kids and the adults both love the design. But trying to remove now after 4 years on the walls, the adhesive is very difficult to remove. I’m going to paint anyway. But don’t be misled and think you will just be able to remove after many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: After searching through Amazon for the right stickers to go up my newly painted walls, I finally found these that seemed perfect - the images are bright and clear, they are very easy to peel and stick (I was able to remove and stick one of 'em at a different spot without a hassle), and they did grab attention of my 10 mo old. It has been close to two months, but they don't show any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: nikci_99

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to wall beware!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely horrible, I applied them in August 2016 to my daughter's wall, and took them down February 2017, they all stuck to the wall and ripped the paint out, even with a hair dryer I had trouble peeling them off, see photos, they use cheap adhesive, had to spackle and paint whole wall stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Gates

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These jungle animal decals are seriously adorable. They are easy to remove if you need to move them to a different location. They have a lot of sticking power. They actually are even cuter in person than the photograph of them.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY TOLBERT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove & look great
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughters "big girl room" when her little brother was on the way. They're a good size, easy for her to see and take up a good amount of wall space. The lion, tiger, and rhino are about 8" in height. These were easy to remove and restick when adjusting their positioning which was a huge plus. UPDATE: Over three years later and these stickers still look awesome! They have had zero issues with sticking to the wall and the colors still look great. I have not ever had one start to peel or come off, well worth the money to add some color and fun to your little's room!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply. Attractive animal designs. I did remove and reapply a few due to the space constraints and there was no problem with the product or the wall. Definitely recommend it. Makes a striking difference to the room.
customer_reviews.author: KRY

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware... troublesome removal process
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and were up in my son's room for nearly 4 years. No issues until it was time to remove them this weekend. AWFUL experience! Adhesive was left behind and chunks of paint came off in a few spots even though I used a hair dryer to help remove the decals. Scrubbed for hours to get the glue off but it's still there. This is compared to the decals we had up for 5.5 years for our older kids and they came off no problem and were able to restick in the playroom. (So it's not just a time issue but rather quality issue.) Will not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Alison D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move around - they keep their stickiness and don't damage walls
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable - and easy to hang and to move! I bought them to make a little area of a guest room cute for our little 18-month old granddaughter. She loves saying the names of the animals! We decided to put her in a different room a few months later and it was easy to move the animals - without damaging the first wall - and they hung beautifully again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T. Jaques

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Out of all the animal decals I think these are the cutest. They’re all so round and friendly looking. They are also bigger than others, which is nice for decorating a kid’s room. I didn’t even use all of them and it still looks full. They also stick on easily and remove easily for when you make mistakes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Colorful Decals for a Child's Room
customer_reviews.text: Nice colorful decals that are easy to apply and totally (and immediately) decorates a wall (or if spaced out properly, an entire average sized room. We arranged the decals to create a playful scene and my daughter loves them. I haven't had to remove any yet, but I assume they will come off easily and leave your walls intact. This item is a definite go.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy they are to peel and place. The characters are cute, my wife had a good time coming up with a scheme..overall great product. Also you can peel off and emplace again if you change your mind on placement.
customer_reviews.author: William Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Colorful fun wall decorations
customer_reviews.text: The animals are fun and colorful, a good size and quantity and easy to apply and reapply. Some of the pieces, like the snake on a branch and the hanging monkey, can creatively integrate with other objects hanging on the wall. We bought this for our son in his nursery, though I find myself enjoying looking at these decals as much as he does.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Schinasi

customer_reviews.title: Makes your kids room, class room or daycare unique
customer_reviews.text: These Decals are excellent quality. These stickers are large in size, for example the alligator is 16" long. These would make a great addition to a kids room, classroom or daycare for decoration. The price is very good for what you get. They come in 4 separate sheets that are 10 5/8" x 17" with several of the characters on each. You get 1 of each character or object shown. They are repositionable so when you stick them somewhere and it isn't quite what you were wanting just peel it back off and reapply it again. The kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Guy

customer_reviews.title: STRONGLY SUGGEST
customer_reviews.text: We've had this set of stickers up about two days and they're already starting to peel off of the wall. I would STRONGLY SUGGEST going over these stickers with a blow dryer once they're in place.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMommyof6

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! The kids LOVE moving them from wall to wall to create different scenes! HOWEVER, do not use them on windows because they may not come off in one piece. We did ruin a few by putting them on windows and a fish tank, but will order more and use only on the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing.They are nice and big, and nicely fill up a wall. They stick very well. And when we moved, we were able to peel them all off and put them on parchment paper, then restick them on the wall of the new place, and they stuck very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: All great quality from this company
customer_reviews.text: All great quality from this company. They stick and look great (other ones we got did not stay on our paint BUT this company's did). Kudos for a great product and price 2+ years later- looking for this brand for our next child's room! saw i reviewed and wanted to comment that years later- still perfectly on the wall! phenomenal quality. not one indication of wear. thanks cherry creek!! room looks awesome and my son has enjoyed his animals and letters.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: As perfect as described. I bought it for my husband's office, he's a pediatrician, and it looks beautiful on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Lucila B.

customer_reviews.title: it looks fine but i'm afraid they may fall or come off ...
customer_reviews.text: I put the stickers up as directed, clean walls and all. I know it gets hot in my room but the stickers start coming off the wall or have random air bubbles show up due to the heat. I did not expect that since it's summer. So far, it looks fine but i'm afraid they may fall or come off the wall. I'm sure if the room was always cool, that there would be no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Asad

customer_reviews.title: These are great! They look awesome on the wall
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They look awesome on the wall. Peeled off the sheets easily and were very easy to smooth out while applying. I had to rearrange a couple and they peeled off and re-stuck very well. The larger animals are a fairly good size too!
customer_reviews.author: Melody A Ikonomovski

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, they don't tear when you're peeling them off the wall or the sheet. Super cute animals and bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sheheryar Kabraji

customer_reviews.title: great fun stickers..
customer_reviews.text: They are so lovely and adorable...for nursery decor or just for fun..we just peel them and stick them..i even peeled and stick them from one room to another and they stayed..great grip and glue... very effective in their glue
customer_reviews.author: heer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. I used them in the room that I've made into a bedroom for my one-year-old granddaughter when she visits. They go on easily, but some of them tend to peel away at a corner or two. No big deal. I just press them back on. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Feisty49

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We decorate our son's room a few days before his birth, they are very good quality, the room looks animated and colorful, I recommend these tapes.
customer_reviews.author: César

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I agree with others that some of the stickers are hard to remove from the backing. However, with persistence and patience, I was successful. At one point, I peeled back the corner to remove the "dead space", leaving the images on the backing. Then they were easy to remove. The pictures are cute, a nice size, easily stick to the wall, and are removable.
customer_reviews.author: Shellsf

customer_reviews.title: ... these sticker to decorate a nursery and i'm very happy i chose them instead of painting the walls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sticker to decorate a nursery and i'm very happy i chose them instead of painting the walls. They were super easy to put on and to peel off (in case you need to re-position) and gave the nursery a totally different (cute) look.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Cheerful wall decals. i have even changed the position a couple of times and they have come off from the wall cleanly and adhered again well. My baby loves them too and she spends a lot of time looking at them on the wall. i'm glad i bought these. Would buy more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in nursery room
customer_reviews.text: I spent less than 30 minutes to put the on the wall over the crib, looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: chatgros

customer_reviews.title: These turned out great! I hung these over my daughters changing table ...
customer_reviews.text: These turned out great! I hung these over my daughters changing table and next to her window. They look amazing. She loves looking at them during diaper changes and making the elephant and monkey noises! I bought more from the same company to do the rest of her room and her play room. So excited to get the rest up after seeing how great these ones turned out!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely adorable. They stick really well
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable. They stick really well. They made my daughter's playroom so much more inviting and warm. I would definitely recommend them. I am planning on buying one more set for my son's bedroom after he is born.
customer_reviews.author: Olga K.

customer_reviews.title: I got it on time and it was super easy to understand what needs to be done
customer_reviews.text: I got it on time and it was super easy to understand what needs to be done. I just peeled and pasted above my baby crib. I had to take out one or two when I missed the line but it was easy to take out and then put back in. It's been more than a month and they are staying. The colors look as good as it shows in the picture. It has been a ritual for my baby to wake up in the morning and smile at the animals as she's just learning to smile. She loves the Giraffe, Lion and Tiger.
customer_reviews.author: Amrita Tamrakar

customer_reviews.title: we love it
customer_reviews.text: I designed this room for my baby, put stickers around corner look great
customer_reviews.author: Dorthy Chai

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Love love them!!! Very cute! Super easy to use! Don't leave the marks and I already re-sticked them several times and no problem!!
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna

customer_reviews.title: Play room looks adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love them sooo beautiful very easy to stick them in the wall. Grandkids very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Kids room and bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We love this for the kids rooms / bathroom they love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love em
customer_reviews.text: Ive been buying these for years, its really the easiest and best way to decorate a room. I did stencils once, took a whole day of painting. These look even better and easy to put up or take down. Less expensive too. Everyone loves the rooms (kids bathroom and bedroom) we put these stencils in.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his room now. Easy to apply and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Risoldi

customer_reviews.title: Cute set of animal stickers
customer_reviews.text: Newborn loves this and looks at it closely with a smile! Easy to stick on, no mess, no fuss! Put them on baby’s wall two months ago and they all still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves these animals
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to apply & move around with no residue or trace left on the wall. Our baby loves to look at these animals when we change his diaper. Makes him smile every time. Very cute
customer_reviews.author: FF

customer_reviews.title: Nice detail to every nursery
customer_reviews.text: Very nice decals, I absolutely love them! Easy to apply and remove, made baby room very bright and funny. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these decals up for 2 months and i still love them. They brighten up the nursery and give ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these decals up for 2 months and i still love them. They brighten up the nursery and give us fun characters to talk about to our son. I can confirm that there can be repositioned without event and they do seem durable. The birds look angry but that's okay with me because i get to say angry birds a lot which reminds me of my youth.
customer_reviews.author: Majpadge

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, easy to paste, I like it my son very like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: yes.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute in our bathroom. Easy to use and we have had them up for several months now with no issues and no peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Double K

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this wall decals. Pretty easy to use and very cute! My baby loves them.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby attention
customer_reviews.text: Since we put these up, the baby looks at that wall now all the time. Grabs his attention and will help with teaching animals. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: ghadley344

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Quality. beautiful for a white wall
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pack as and option for my daughter's room. We painted the walls in white walls and these are perfect for it. It's a very glossy and good quality paper. Nice colors. Won't regret.
customer_reviews.author: Klauss

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my son's jungle nursery
customer_reviews.text: Cute little wall clings that don't ruin paint! This was perfect for my son's jungle nursery. They do not fall off (like some other cheaper brands) and easily peel off when you are ready to take them down with no damage to the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Aumann

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice
customer_reviews.text: We spent a lot of time looking for good quality decals for the nursery, and we were really impressed by how good these looked and how well they stuck to the wall we would definitely buy these again the size and the printing is very sharp and colors are vivid.
customer_reviews.author: Hhoughton

customer_reviews.title: Rich consistent color, art, texture and stick performance.
customer_reviews.text: Great consistent color, art, texture and stick performance. I’ve purchased two sets from this compacny, and love them for my kid and I.
customer_reviews.author: Los

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: These are colorful stickers, my kid (10-months) loves them. He requests to imitate the sounds that each animal makes ( i get puzzled when it comes to zebra or turtle), it's a real fun. We have them in different places in the room, and he walks to each of them. This product is great. You can also swap stickers, easily remove and stick somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Elman

customer_reviews.title: Damaged walls
customer_reviews.text: Cute stickers, but we removed these from walls after a couple of years and they tore off paint and even parts of the dry wall. The walls were flat paint so perhaps that is the issue. If so, they should really indicate this in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good for decor
customer_reviews.text: Designs are adorable and my 2 year old loves them. Good if you plan to stick once and leave them. They rip easily so not great if you plan to stick and move as something to do with kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: The kids love them. and its easy to change out the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used them for the kids to look at while they play in the blow up pool which i use as a playpen for the twins. The kids love them. and its easy to change out the stickers so they always have something new to look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Shivali

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Every one love it little cute animal size is also good . Easy to peel you can stick them randomly in two diffrent room kids love it nice decoration for kids room or infant nursery
customer_reviews.author: mayur

customer_reviews.title: Stay at home dad approved
customer_reviews.text: Kids loves em!!! Real good quality, I stick them on the outside glass pane so the little turds can't peel them off!!
customer_reviews.author: STAY  @  HOME  DAD

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good value
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than i was expecting and so cute. They've been up for a day and so far no peeling. We also got a shower curtain with a world map and animals on it and they look great together
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lebold

customer_reviews.title: love this! my sons room looks great
customer_reviews.text: love this! my sons room looks great! they are very decorative and pleasant. my son loves to say goodnight to all the animals on his wall before he goes to bed. had this product over a year and they still look as great as they did when i first got them, i highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mt

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: These are even cuter in person. They stick really well to both walls and mirrors. My 1 year old son LOVES pointing out all of the animals.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, a little smell like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Love these! As promised. Worked above and next to our changing table as a "mobile" since we have a two year old who's getting too big for a mobile but wanted our baby to have some fun stuff to look at. A little smelly, but not for that long. Probably air our a few days in your garage before putting them in kiddo rooms.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This has surpassed my expectations even after reading the positive reviews. Very well made, easily removable and the sizes couldn’t have been more perfect for us. I’d recommend!
customer_reviews.author: hiwot

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So fun and perfect for any room. Colorful and easy!
customer_reviews.author: keroppi

customer_reviews.title: these stick perfectly on the wall
customer_reviews.text: stick perfectly and are adorable. really brightens up the room. previous brands did not stick at all, these have been hanging perfectly for about a year
customer_reviews.author: Civi Perlitsh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product! I’d recommend this for any infant over 2 months old!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these decals! Our 2.5 month old son loves to smile at the Elephant, Monkey, Giraffe and Tiger! We’ve spread the decals across three different rooms so that we can show him the animals as we walk around the house. Highly recommend this product and kudos to the artists who’ve made such lovable characters!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzmanchan

customer_reviews.title: cute and good quality stickers
customer_reviews.text: Very cute stickers. Have had them on nursery room for about 5 months and they haven't peeled whatsoever which was one of the most common complains from other customers. Size of animals is decent to simply add color and fun to baby's room
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to receive this item yesterday..it was exactly what I wanted. Worth every penny and so adorable, I love how they look on my wall. Greatly quality and great look
customer_reviews.author: Mom2three

customer_reviews.title: and the animals are so adorable!! We used these as part of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are bright and colorful, and the animals are so adorable!! We used these as part of the decorations for a jungle-themed baby shower, and they stuck really well to the windows and were easy to peel off and stick back on the original backing for later use. I already told my husband that I want to decorate our future baby's room with these :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, pleasing, appealing....the best
customer_reviews.text: You can't ask for anything better..See the photo I have attached. It is just perfect..I hope the order in which I have placed them help other buyers too in deciding how they want to arrange it on their wall 😊
customer_reviews.author: Vdubbs

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Good value
customer_reviews.text: Used about half of the package so far. Super cute!!!! Love love these! They’re so colorful and happy. Very easy to apply and seem very durable. I’d order from this company again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are adorable, my daughter loves them. Good quality. We placed them on our walls and furniture, no issues with removing them either.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: Actually sticks
customer_reviews.text: Damage free. I haven’t had decals this sturdy in a while
customer_reviews.author: Janice Blount

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: my daugter loves it..I think she started walking to touch each decal one by one without support. thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jalpa Vasani

customer_reviews.title: ... and her closets with all animals things and she enjoyed it very very
customer_reviews.text: Is very cute my granddaughter is in the animals big time so I gave her the packages and just let her do her chores and her closets with all animals things and she enjoyed it very very much
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Trust me you and the baby both will like them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wall decal for my baby niece and it is pretty good. This decals are big, cute and adorable. Also, this is durable because I was taking off and on because I couldn't figure how to decorate them and it didn't tear at all. But I would like to suggest the buyers to figure first where and how want to put them on and then stick it on wall. I like the product and price. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Tsering Gurung

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality stickers
customer_reviews.text: Great decoration for my newborns room. I bought other products that peeled off on the first day. This product actually sticks.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best decals i bought for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Best decals i bought for my baby.i have seen so many decals on etsy they are expensive.But these are really good and easily stick to any wall.I have pop corn wall still they stay good.My baby smiles alot if she looks at lion ...
customer_reviews.author: Deepa

customer_reviews.title: my 10 months old baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: it put a happy face everytime he sees the stickers.. size is good and the stick is well..

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make a sign for my friends daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and they look great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 year old grandsons room for when he visits. He loves them. Easy to put on and they look great.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, must place perfectly first time or they loose stickiness
customer_reviews.text: These stick great but you only have one shot ar getting them where you want them. DOnt try peeling them off and resticking them
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: The decals are super cute but smaller then I would have liked

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Kids love it! Colors the whole room up. Be creative with placement.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these two places around my toddler bed for my granddaughter. They are large and colorful and very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and they stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Great stickers, I used on grandkids toy bin to dress it up a little. They loved them !
customer_reviews.author: Ron J.

customer_reviews.title: Look great, go on and off the walls easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the peel and stick stuff. We are a military family and move often, so these allow us to decorate and redecorate as needed without any work. They look nice, go on easily and come off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T.

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5, but for the fact that it is not easy to remove about 25% of the stickers without damage.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, I did have 1 sticker that would ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product , I did have 1 sticker that would not come off , but everything else looks great
customer_reviews.author: seller

customer_reviews.title: worked well and cute
customer_reviews.text: Finally put these up. Tom me s bit too get the hang of peeling but they stuck great even on my slightly textured wall. Very bright colours and cute design. Haven't tried repositioning. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: loved the quality of the stickers they are perfectly sized and add charm to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Ankit

customer_reviews.title: Good size and cute
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter's room and hung the stickers up. They are super cute, nice size and stuck to the wall good
customer_reviews.author: Jhughes86

customer_reviews.title: They are super cute and my 18 month old was stoked when ...
customer_reviews.text: Although these were much smaller than I was expecting they still worked out for the area I needed them for. They are super cute and my 18 month old was stoked when he saw them in his playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: There was a mix up in the delivery and I ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a mix up in the delivery and I had posted a one star review. I finally received it and the decorations are lovely. They are meant for a child’s room. So I give it a five star!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Teresa Morgan

customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Gave our infant son's room a fun colorful feel to it without being overly babyish. Easy to apply. Haven't removed them yet so can't comment on that.

customer_reviews.title: These are Awesome! I thought they'd be too small and was ...
customer_reviews.text: These are Awesome! I thought they'd be too small and was planning on ordering another type of wall sticker but they're enough for the whole nursery. My 2 month old LOVES looking at them and actually talks/laughs at them (I think he likes the large eyes with the black/white contrast)... my mom is ordering some for our cousins!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C.

product_meta.title: Safari Adventure Decorative Peel & Stick Wall Art Sticker Decals
product_meta.description:
Create a stunning woodland theme on any wall

 Avoid the need for completely redecorating a room and instead, create a fun and bright décor for your child or children the easy way. The cost of paint, wall paper and the time to do it can be expensive and time consuming. Instead, take the simpler option of wall decals which will save you money and precious time and will have your chosen room looking great in minutes rather than days. 

Our range of safari sticker decals are unique, you can create your own design by positioning the cute animals wherever you want. Getting your child involved makes it a fun activity for all ages too! 

 How to apply the decals 

 Choose a clean and dry surface in your room of choice. It can be a wall, door or other flat surface. If it has recently been painted, we advise a good two week period for the surface to become completely dry before applying the decals. Peel your stickers away from the sheeting and carefully apply to your surface. 

If for any reason you choose to remove your decals, they can be lifted and peeled away easily, without leaving any residue or sticky mess and without the need for redecorating! 

 Safe for everyone 

 Safety is hugely important, especially when children are involved. Therefore, we have ensured that our wall decals have passed SGS tests and are nontoxic throughout. 

 BUY NOW and easily add a safari theme to your child’s wall
feature_bullets: DECORATIVE – brighten up your child’s room without the need for time consuming and expensive redecorating with our wall décor stickers for kids

VERSATILITY – perfect for a child’s bedroom, nursery, playroom and ideal for public areas that kids love such as the library, activity room, doctor’s office, day care center, kindergarten rooms and more
SIZE – each purchase includes 4 sheets of wall stickers measuring 18” x 10.5”
DESIGNS – our original wall stickers for kids are full of cute safari animals including monkeys, giraffe, crocodile, lion, hippo, rhino, zebra, and turtles to really bring a boring wall to life
APPLICATION – easily apply our wall décor stickers to any plain wall or flat surface, when you need to remove them they simply peel away without leaving any marks or residue
